description: Manages network access control list (ACL) rules on Apache CloudStack based clouds.

domain.description: Domain the VPC is related to.

end_port.description: End port for this rule. Considered if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp). If not specified, equal C(start_port).

icmp_type.description: Type of the icmp message being sent. Considered if C(protocol=icmp).

poll_async.description: Poll async jobs until job has finished.

api_url.description: URL of the CloudStack API e.g. https://cloud.example.com/client/api.

zone.description: Name of the zone the VPC related to. If not set, default zone is used.

protocol_number.description: Protocol number from 1 to 256 required if C(protocol=by_number).

state.description: State of the network ACL rule.

api_key.description: API key of the CloudStack API.

icmp_code.description: Error code for this icmp message. Considered if C(protocol=icmp).

start_port.description: Start port for this rule. Considered if C(protocol=tcp) or C(protocol=udp).

tags.description: List of tags. Tags are a list of dictionaries having keys C(key) and C(value). If you want to delete all tags, set a empty list e.g. C(tags: []).

api_secret.description: Secret key of the CloudStack API.

vpc.description: VPC the network ACL is related to.

account.description: Account the VPC is related to.

api_region.description: Name of the ini section in the C(cloustack.ini) file.

project.description: Name of the project the VPC is related to.
